title: The Lord of the Rings: Return to Moria™ Beorn’s Lodge Pack
description: Build a wooden lodge and sip honey tea by the hearth as the Dwarves relive tales of the Carrock and Wilderland. This Beorn-inspired pack includes an all new, comprehensive set of wooden building blocks and a comfy new cosmetic outfit to enjoy it in.
